name: Diancie Prism Star
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

abilities.name: Princess’s Cheers
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your {F} Pokémon’s attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Diamond Rain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
